Title: Authorizes on-site inspections of housing in violation of zoning laws for purposes of enforcing illegal housing laws and regulations
Summary: Authorizes on-site inspections of housing in violation of zoning laws for purposes of enforcing illegal housing laws and regulations.
LawCode: Add ยง99-z, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to authorized on-site inspections of housing in violation of zoning laws
